CREATE TABLE balance ( id serial NOT NULL, partners_id integer, payment_id integer, accounttype_id integer, eventdate timestamp with time zone, amount double precision, txversion integer, CONSTRAINT pk_balance PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT fk_balance_partner FOREIGN KEY (partners_id) REFERENCES partners (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_payment_balance FOREIGN KEY (payment_id) REFERENCES payment (id) MATCH simple ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_balance_accounttype FOREIGN KEY (accounttype_id) REFERENCES reference (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE RESTRICT ON DELETE RESTRICT ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE balance OWNER TO sa; GRANT ALL ON TABLE balance TO sa;
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX balance_pk ON balance USING btree (id );
